title: How to Make Chinese Candied Bananas

steps.headline: Cut the bananas into chunks (about 5 pieces per banana).
Beat the eggs in the bowl.
Mix the eggs with the flour.
Coat the  bananas with the mixture of eggs and flour.
Pour the cooking oil into the pot/wok;  put on high.
When the oil is hot enough, put the coated bananas into the oil.
When the pieces of bananas are getting golden, take them out and put them in a dish.
While the bananas are hot, put the honey on them and sprinkle on some black sesame seeds.

text: Peel the bananas.  Cut the bananas into chunks (about 5 pieces per banana).  Beat the eggs in the bowl.  Mix the eggs with the flour.  Coat the  bananas with the mixture of eggs and flour.  Pour the cooking oil into the pot/wok;  put on high.  When the oil is hot enough, put the coated bananas into the oil.  When the pieces of bananas are getting golden, take them out and put them in a dish.  While the bananas are hot, put the honey on them and sprinkle on some black sesame seeds.  Finished.
